Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item, but a tool designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this remarkable product for $125. I trust it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
